alert.note: Alert for Orange (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Orange County through 830 PM EDT... At 744 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Middletown to near Sussex. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Warwick, Goshen, Chester, Florida, Unionville, Westtown, Slate Hill, Pine Island and New Hampton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
